backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, posts, comments, notifications, follow requests, messaging, stories, feature flags, and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style sheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, TanStack Router routes, and access controls for all main pages including admin, messages, settings, and support.
frontend/src/components/admin/FeatureFla: Admin panel component that loads and toggles feature flags with update mutations and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PostModera: Displays a list of posts for moderators with loading/error states and delete controls for up to 20 posts.
frontend/src/components/admin/SupportIss: Fetches and displays support issues in a table with status controls, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserModera: Lets moderators search for a user and perform actions like block, verify, or change roles, with safeguards for admin accounts.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header navigation, content outlet, mobile tab bar, and desktop footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Renders a login card allowing users to sign in via Internet Identity with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children, showing login or profile setup if needed and handling identity/profile loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Restricts access to admin/officer users, showing a denial message for others.
Shows a horizontal row of active stories with avatars, loading placeholders, and a viewer modal.
frontend/src/components/IdeaList.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the idea list component.
frontend/src/components/IdeaSubmissionFo: Empty file placeholder for the idea submission form component.
frontend/src/components/nav/HeaderNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, profile access, notifications, and moderator tools for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTabBar: Bottom navigation bar for mobile with main tabs and an extra moderation tab for privileged users.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post with author info, image, like/share/delete actions, and navigation to post or profile pages.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostGrid.t: Renders a grid of posts showing images or captions and navigates to post detail on click.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog for editing profile fields, validating input, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button handling pending states, requests, and error notifications.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowRe: Displays incoming follow requests with approve/deny actions and requester details.
frontend/src/components/profile/Highligh: Static highlights row UI with placeholder items and a ‘new’ button.
frontend/src/components/profile/MediaCon: Admin panel for toggling global media feature flags like filters and music.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar image with configurable size and fallback.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Form for creating a new user profile with basic fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/profile/SuperAdm: Admin panel component allowing blocking, unblocking, verifying, unverifying users, and deleting their posts with success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verified: Renders a checkmark badge, styled differently for admins versus regular verified users.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for uploading and previewing an image story with validation and submission to the createStory hook.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoryVie: Full‑screen dialog for viewing a story image with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminModeration.ts: Provides mutations for blocking, unblocking, verifying, unverifying, and role‑changing users, invalidating profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeatureFlags.ts: Queries and updates backend feature flags using the actor, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFollowRequests.ts: Manages pending follow requests and approval/denial actions, updating related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Hooks for conversations and messaging, including fetching conversations, messages, creating conversations, and sending messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Provides hooks to fetch notifications and mark them as read using react-query and actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Defines hooks for fetching, creating, deleting, liking, and unliking posts, with query invalidation for feed updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Implements profile-related hooks to fetch, create, and update user profiles via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialGraph.ts: Contains hooks for retrieving followers/following lists and performing follow/unfollow actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides hooks to fetch active stories, get a story by ID, and create new stories with image blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Defines hooks for submitting, fetching, and updating support issues through actor APIs.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortalPage.tsx: Renders an admin portal with tabs for moderating users, posts, features, and support issues.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Implements a messaging view that loads a conversation, displays messages, and allows sending new ones.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page that lets users create a post with caption and optional image, handles validation, upload, and restricted accounts.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Explore page providing user search and a grid of recent posts.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeedPage.tsx: Loads and displays the user's home feed with stories, posts, and empty/error states.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Shows the user's conversations list with loading/empty states and navigation to individual chats.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays notifications and pending follow requests, allowing marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Detail view for a single post with image, likes, comments, and share functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, visibility rules, posts, and actions like follow, message, and edit.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the settings page with logout handling and a link to the support page.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Implements a support issue submission form with category selection, validation, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/utils/postImage.ts: Provides utilities to convert image data to blob URLs, revoke them, and convert File objects to Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, issues, and requirements for continuing Instabook development.
